From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Time Bomb arives back at the base, dropping Land Mine is a CR Chamber, his
ego preventing him from getting into one himself. The Pod outside of the
base opens. Time Bomb wanted to ask Megatron first, but he knew he couldn't
let it sit out there. He walked outside of the base and stared at the
creature. It was a spider, a large Trapdoor Spider.

"Halt! Which side are you aligned with?" Time Bomb asked. The Spider
transformed to robot mode, he looked meaner than the meanest thing to crawl
out of the pit.

"What sides are there?" He asked.

"Well, we're the Predacons under Megatron's comand, and--" Time Bomb was cut
off.

"Good, I'm a Pred." The Spider said. Time Bomb kept his cannon out.

"What's your name? And which Preds are you with?" Time Bomb asked.

"Etchingar. And I'm on Megatrangs side, too." The spider replied.

"It's Megatron, Megatron may get annoyed if you can't get his name right, he
may give you clean up for a job." Time Bomb said. Etchingar looked annoyed.

"Look, is it my fault your leader has a confusing name? Come on! I want to
join and get off of these stupid streets!" Etchingar yelled.

"Megatron, a Pred from a pod out here wants to join, shall I let him? He has
made no challenges and just wants to join some team to get off of the
'Streets." Time Bomb said into his commlink tuned to Megatron's frequency...
----- Original Message -----
From: <JP3884@...>

Subject: Re: DrillBit back at base
